title: auto fill in dynamic que
body:
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 
so you guys have put a auto fill feature in that will make a fast que time if there is a small player base at the time of the que.

I think this is one of the worst ideas you guys have came up with, I would rather wait 15mins to play a game in one of the 2 roles I choose than
wait 3 mins and get a role I do not play.
this feature will increase players being more toxic/trolling or dodging which 2 of them takes the fun away and dodging will increase the wait time
anyway.

I'm not saying its so bad and must go but surly you guys have thought of maybe making it a toggle feature for the players that would rather wait to
play what they want rather than playing a round which might cause bad behaved players or poorly performed players as they are not in there main roles.

please come back and say something like yes we are implementing a toggle feature.

replies.body: Lower your rank then, you'll always get the role you want in Bronze.

sadly I am
but still get it

That seems highly unlikely.

The Auto Fill feature only exists for High Diamond and above. It's not turned on for any other elo at all.
well its true its down the bottom of the screen and the tool tip appears telling you that auto fill is on to "save time in que"

I'm in Silver with Gold MMR and I never see it.

Pretty sure if you had it I would definitely have it.

I think riot needs to implement toggle features a lot more. there is so many situations where some players would rather this and some would rather that and it would all be solved with a simple toggle ... riot plis
